EnableTemporalVersioning()

Enables temporal versioning for all entities in the context. When enabled the provider generates history tables and triggers to track changes over time.

Declaration
public DbContextOptions EnableTemporalVersioning()
Returns
Type Description
DbContextOptions

The current DbContextOptions instance for chaining.
| Edit this page View Source

UseInMemoryCache()

Enables the built-in in-memory cache for query results using NormMemoryCacheProvider. The cache is scoped by tenant when a ITenantProvider is available.

Declaration
public DbContextOptions UseInMemoryCache()
Returns
Type Description
DbContextOptions

The current DbContextOptions instance for chaining.
| Edit this page View Source

Validate()

Validates the configured options ensuring all values fall within allowed ranges and required settings are provided. Throws InvalidOperationException if any configuration is invalid.

Declaration
public void Validate()
